mapper.select: SELECT a.e_num , a.e_product , a.e_amount , b.e_count FROM e_main a , (SELECT x.e_num , sum(x.e_count) as e_count FROM e_list x GROUP BY x.e_num) b WHERE a.e_num = b.e_num(+) ORDER BY a.e_num
select * from e_winner order by e_num asc
mapper.insert: insert into e_winner(e_winner_seq,e_num,e_product,member_email,name) (select e_winner_seq,e_num,e_product,member_email,name from (select rownum as e_winner_seq , e_num , e_product , member_email , name from e_list where e_num = #{e_num} order by dbms_random.value) where rownum <= (select e_amount from E_MAIN where e_num = #{e_num}))
